revised_title: The Emergence and Development of Free Radical Chemistry
tldr: This article discusses the development of free radical chemistry, a branch of chemistry that studies highly reactive, short-lived free radicals. The author provides a historical overview of the field, from its early beginnings to the recognition of free radicals' unique chemical properties. The article highlights key discoveries and experiments that led to the understanding of free radicals' atom-like reactivity and their role in various chemical reactions.
